title: No refund option?
body: I've been browsing the new League store and noticed that the option to refund any purchases is gone?? Any help is appreciated, but I cannot find it in any of the tabs.

replies.body:
Hmmm...try doing this:

When you open the new store, look to the upper right hand corner where you should see a small button that shows a person and a cog wheel.  Once selected, select "Purchase History" on the left hand side under "Account".  Once there, you should see your full history and options to refund as well.

If you are staring at this specific screen and still aren't seeing it, can you take a screenshot of your client and link it in your reply?
